channel.title: CVE Feed for Timersys -- WP Popups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Timersys -- WP Popups

item.title: CVE-2024-29105|2024-03-19T15:39:26.880Z -- Timersys -- WP Popups
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Timersys WP Popups allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Popups: from n/a through 2.1.5.5.
